definition: Strauss (name) (Tw)/Johann Strauss (1825-1899), Austrian composer/Richard Strauss (1864-1949), German composer
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: "A rapid recovery is possible, " Strauss-Kahn said.
sentences.chinese: “快速複雜是可能的”，史特勞斯康說。

sentences.english: The Straus family acquires a general partnership with Macy's.
sentences.chinese: 史特勞斯家族取得梅西百貨的多數股權。
